```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)

iris = iris
```

```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Sepal's Length",
       y = "Petal's Width",
       title = "Sepal's length vs. Petal's width across three species")
  
  
```
